name: genesis-music
description: AI-powered guitar learning platform for rock/metal enthusiasts

scripts.dev: concurrently -n "FRONT,BACK,AI" -c "cyan,yellow,magenta" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:ai"
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: concurrently "npm run test:frontend" "npm run test:backend" "npm run test:ai"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:ai
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend && npm run format:ai
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend && npm run clean:ai
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../ai-models && pip install -r requirements.txt

author: Genesis Music Developer
